title: Changes in potential energy  from force position

content.question: The graph above shows a conservative force Fx as a function of position x acting on an object in a closed system. If this is the only force acting on the object, what happens to the potential energy of the system as the object moves from 0 m to 0.10 m?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
